description: Hard boundaries that disqualify opportunities. When triggered, politely decline and do not offer scheduling.
disqualify_response: Thanks for your interest, but this doesn't seem like the right fit for what I'm looking for. I appreciate you reaching out.

relocation.notes: Willing to relocate to TX. Open to geo-bachelor arrangements in select locations.

location.hard_no_response: I appreciate the opportunity, but I'm not considering roles that require relocation to that area. Thanks for your interest.

compensation.floor_response: I appreciate your interest, but that compensation range is below what I'm targeting for my next role. Thanks for reaching out.
compensation.vague_response: I'm open to discussing compensation that reflects the scope and impact of the role. What range are you targeting for this position?

role_type.notes: Open to both IC and leadership roles at the right level

employment_type.notes: Prefer W-2 but open to 1099 if total comp accounts for benefits

clearance.notes: Security clearance details should be discussed directly, not via AI

other_dealbreakers: Roles with no technical leadership component
linkedin_fallback: I'd love to connect - you can find me on LinkedIn at linkedin.com/in/chrishartline
